overview_of_class: Features guest speakers who are global and national industry leaders as well as faculty members from Northwestern and other colleges. Speakers provide analysis and evaluation of technology as a potential antidote to problems resulting from fragmentation of care.
name: Health Information Technology for Communication, Coordination and Integration
title: SoC HLTH_COM 479-0-20 Health Information Technology for Communication, Coordination and Integration
